actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend section 170 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to certain charitable contributions by members of the Civil Air Patrol.

summary.text: Amends the tax deduction provisions of the Internal Revenue Code to designate as a charitable contribution that portion of the expenses of a taxpayer which are attributable to the operation, maintenance, and repair of vehicles owned by the taxpayer which bears a specified ratio to the amount of time such vehicles are used for rendering gratuitous services to the Civil Air Patrol.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 170 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to certain charitable contributions by members of the Civil Air Patrol.
